extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Junos OS Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the Junos OS version is affected by checking the installed version against the list of vulnerable versions.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Junos OS version affected?
Is upgrading to a fixed version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Fixed Junos OS Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the Junos OS to a fixed version or newer to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which workaround method will be used?

extracted_playbook.title: Limit J-Web Access to Trusted Hosts and Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to the J-Web configuration interface to only trusted hosts and networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable J-Web
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the J-Web interface as a workaround to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit J-Web Access to Trusted Hosts
extracted_playbook.description: Limit access to the J-Web interface to only trusted hosts as a workaround to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: Juniper Networks Junos OS SRX Series and EX Series Vulnerability
